import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { DashboardService } from './service/dashboard.service'; import { dashboard } from 'src/app/interfaces/interfaces'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.css'] }) export class DashboardComponent { dashboard:dashboard[]=[] constructor(private dashboardSvc:DashboardService){} ngOnInit() { this.dashboardSvc.getdata().subscribe(res=>{ this.dashboard=res console.log(this.dashboard) }) } }
